DOC.brief_summary: To assess immunogenicity PCV13 ( 13 valent pneumococcal conjugate vaccine ) vaccine compare PPV23 ( 23 valent pneumococcal polysaccharide vaccine ) vaccine patient treat chronic hemodialysis pre-immunized PPSV23 vaccine PPV23 vaccine naïve measure ELISA OPA ( opsonophagocytic assay ) titers 4 52 week .
DOC.brief_title: 13 Valent Pneumococcal Conjugate Vaccine Chronic Dialysis Patients
DOC.detailed_description: The immunogenicity PCV13 ( 13 valent pneumococcal conjugate vaccine ) vaccine compare PPV23 ( 23 valent pneumococcal polysaccharide vaccine ) vaccine patient treat chronic hemodialysis pre-immunized PPV23 vaccine PPV23 vaccine naïve measure ELISA OPA ( opsonophagocytic assay ) titers 4 52 week .
DOC.criteria: 1. chronic dialysis treatment 2. 50 year old pregnant 3. immediate life threaten condition 4. allergic one compound vaccine 5. known pneumococcal vaccination status 6. give inform consent . Patients fulfil inclusion criterion .
